body.p: The IFRIC noted that lenders manage loans to entities in financial difficulty in a variety of ways including one or more of the following:

li.p: selling the loans in the market to other investors/lenders;
renegotiating the terms of the loan (eg extension of the maturity date or lower interest payments); or
accepting the creditor’s equity instruments in full or partial settlement of the liability (sometimes referred to as a ‘debt for equity swap’).
